BibleStudyGui::BrowseVersesModel

BibleStudyGui::BrowseVersesModel Class Reference

This class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that is used to browse the verses of multiple translations. More...

Detailed Description

This class is an implementation of a model from the Qt Model/View framework for a tree view that is used to browse the verses of multiple translations.
